site name: Site name shown in page title
welcome:
Welcome message shown in page title of frontpage
{{Identical|Welcome}}
change language: Language switcher shown at the bottom of every page
change language button: Label fur button in the footer that executes a language change.
sign in:
Button for signing into the site
{{Identical|Sign in}}
papers please: Intro shown on the login page
username:
Label for the username field on login/registration pages
{{Identical|Username}}
enter username: Placeholder for the username field on login/registration pages
password:
Label for the password field on login/registraiton pages
{{Identical|Password}}
enter password: Placeholder for the password field on login/registration pages
no account yet: Invitation to register account on registration page
invite link needed: Message shown on the registration page explaining that new users need an invitation link to make an account
enter your info: Instructions for creating an account and providing an invite code, shown on the registration page
already got an account: Invitation to login shown on the registration page
enter email: Placeholder for the email field on the registration page
email optional: Label for the email field on the registration page
agree to terms: Explanation shown on registration page that user will agree to terms by registering
need username: Error shown when the given field is missing from a form submission.
need password: Error shown when the given field is missing from a form submission.
bad username: Error shown when user tries to login with invalid credentials.
bad password: Error shown when user tries to login with invalid credentials.
accesskey: Tooltip shown on all links that have an access key (keyboard shortcut). See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/accesskey for technical background.
already logged in: Warning shown on registration page when user attempts to create an additional account while logged in.
invalid email format: Error shown on registration page when email appears invalid.
invalid username characters: Error shown on registration page when email contains invalid characters: %s
unknown error: Error message that is shown when an unknown error occurred processing form data on any form.
username too long: Error message that is shown if the given field exceeds the maximum length.
email too long: Error message that is shown if the given field exceeds the maximum length.
password too short: Error message that is shown when a password is deemed insecure because of its shortness.
username exists: Error message that is shown when a username already exists as the user attempts to register.
write a review: Title that is shown on the page for writing new reviews
new review: Button for writing a new review
help:
Heading for context-sensitive help in different parts of the user interface
{{Identical|Help}}
review url: Label for URL field on review form
review url help label:
Label for context-sensitive help for URLs on review form
{{Identical|URL}}
enter web address: Placeholder for URL field on review form. Feel free to localize the example to a more familiar one in the language you're translating to, but please also adapt {{msg-libreviews|enter title}} if you do.
review url help: Context-sensitive help text for review URL on review form
review title: Label for title field on review form
review title help label:
Label for context-sensitive help for title field on review form
{{Identical|Title}}
enter title: Placeholder for title field for review form.  Feel free to localize the example to a more familiar one in the language you're translating to, but please also adapt {{msg-libreviews|enter web address}} if you do.
review title help: Context-sensitive help text for review title on review form
review text help: Context-sensitive help for review text on review form. Please preserve tabindex attribute for external links so they remain keyboard-accessible, and target so they open in new window.
1 star help: Context-sensitive help text for star rating on review form
2 stars help: Context-sensitive help text for star rating on review form
3 stars help: Context-sensitive help text for star rating on review form
4 stars help: Context-sensitive help text for star rating on review form
5 stars help: Context-sensitive help text for star rating on review form
publish:
Button for publishing review and other content
{{Identical|Publish}}
preview:
Button for previewing review and other content
{{Identical|Preview}}
preview title:
Generic heading that is shown above content for some previews
{{Identical|Preview}}
new review terms: Terms user agrees to by submitting a review. Please preserve link target so link opens in new window.
add more: Label for additional fields on review form
draft loaded: Notice shown when a draft is loaded from browser storage (see https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Window/localStorage for technical background).
abandon draft: Button for abandoning a draft loaded from browser storage
load frontpage: Tooltip shown over logo to load the site front page.
terms:
Link to terms of use
{{Identical|Terms of use}}
not a url: Notice shown when user attempts to add invalid URL on review form
add http: Link action that prepends http:// prefix to an incomplete URL
add https: Link action that prepends https:// prefix to an incomplete URL
freedom: Footer notice informing user how to exercise freedoms they have with regard to content, community and software
code:
Footer link to source code repository. %1$s is substituted with GitHub repository, %2$s with notabug mirror.
{{Identical|Source code}}
signin required: Notice that signing in is required to perform an action, shown in multiple contexts
complete all required fields: Notice shown on multiple forms when user attempts to submit form without completing all required fields
correct errors: Notice shown on multiple forms when user attempts to submit form without correcting a previously reported validation error
need review-url: Notice shown on form when user submits form without providing the given field.
need review-title: Notice shown on form when user submits form without providing the given field.
need review-text: Notice shown on form when user submits form without providing the given field.
need review-rating: Notice shown on form when user submits form without providing the given field.
unexpected form data: Generic error when a form is submitted with unexpected data
live preview: Label for checkbox that toggles preview as the user creates content
byline: Byline shown under a review. %1$s is replaced with username link, %2$s is replaced with date.
preview of: Headline that is shown above the preview contents of a review. %s is substituted with the URL or label of the review subject.
got it:
Button for dismissing a notice without additional action
{{Identical|Got it}}
invalid star rating: Error that is shown if a user submits a form with an invalid rating
review title too long: Error that is shown if a user submits a form with text that is too long for the given field
invalid language code: Error that is shown if a user submits a form with a language code that is invalid
feed: Headline that is shown for activity feeds (currently just review feeds)
one or multiple stars:
Text representation for the number of stars of a given review, used for example as ALT text
{{Identical|Star}}
one or multiple reviews:
Used as part of a summary line, currently only displayed for subjects with more than one review.
{{Identical|Review}}
review metrics: Summary line for review metrics. %1$s is substituted with the parametrized content of 'one or multiple stars', and %2$s is substituted with the parametrized content of 'one or multiple reviews'.
captcha intro: CAPTCHA introduction on some forms, currently unused
question: famous painting: Simple CAPTCHA for some forms, feel free to adapt question and answer to local context consistent with key name
answer: famous painting: Simple CAPTCHA for some forms, feel free to adapt question and answer to local context consistent with key name
question: famous composer: Simple CAPTCHA for some forms, feel free to adapt question and answer to local context consistent with key name
answer: famous composer: Simple CAPTCHA for some forms, feel free to adapt question and answer to local context consistent with key name
question: famous scientist: Simple CAPTCHA for some forms, feel free to adapt question and answer to local context consistent with key name
answer: famous scientist: Simple CAPTCHA for some forms, feel free to adapt question and answer to local context consistent with key name
need captcha-answer: Notice that user needs to complete CAPTCHA to proceed
incorrect captcha answer: Error that informs user CAPTCHA answer on a form is incorrect
invalid url: Error that informs user that a submitted URL is invalid.
more info: Link shown in a review heading pointing to page about review subject, which may contain additional reviews and information
add label: Button on a page about a review subject that lets user add a label for the subject
edit:
Generic button or link text to edit a given item
{{Identical|Edit}}
edit label: Button on a page about a review subject that lets user edit a label for the subject
thing not found title: Title for page informing user that a given review subject ('thing' in our parlance) was not found
thing not found: Content for page informing user that a given review subject was not found
review not found title: Title for page informing user that a given review was not found
review not found: Content for page informing user that a given review was not found
enter label: Placeholder for field that lets user add a label to a review subject
cancel:
Generic link label for cancelling a form submission
{{Identical|Cancel}}
review of:
Title that is shown on review pages, %s is substituted with review subject
{{Identical|Review}}
permission error: Generic error message that is shown if a user attempts to perform an action they do not have permission to perform
permanent link:
Generic label for links to an item using a permanent identifier that will not change even if the item changes
{{Identical|Permalink}}
something went wrong: Title for generic error message if a software error occurred that was not anticipated
report an error: Content for generic error message if a software error occurred that was not anticipated
error details: For users with sufficient privileges encountering an error, headline for additional details that are exposed along with a generic error
delete:
Generic button or link label for deleting an item
{{Identical|Delete}}
page not found title: Title for a generic message shown when a resource was not found and the resource type could not be identified
page not found: Content for a generic message shown when a resource was not found and the resource type could not be identified
delete review: Link label for deleting a review
edit review: Link label for editing a review
delete preamble: Generic notice shown when deleting content
also delete thing: When deleting a review, label for checkbox that lets users with sufficient privileges delete review subject along with the review. %s is substituted with identifier of review subject
need delete-action: Error shown on incomplete delete form submission
review deleted: Title for notice that is shown after a review has been deleted
review has been deleted: Content for notice that is shown after review has been deleted
editing in language: Please change the language name from 'English' to the language you're translating to. Permanently dismissible notice that is shown when editing a review subject's metadata, informing the user that they are writing in the language you're translating this message to
writing a review in language: Please change the language name from 'English' to the language you're translating to. Permanently dismissible notice that is shown when editing a review, informing the user that they are writing in the language you're translating this message to
never show this again: Generic button for permanently dismissing a dismissible notice
notice suppressed: Title for success message when a dismissible notice has been dismissed, if JavaScript is disabled
notices of type suppressed: Content for success message when a dismissible notice has been dismissed, if JavaScript is disabled
unsupported notice: Title for error that is shown when the software does not recognize a notice the user is attempting to dismiss
unsupported notice type: Content for error that is shown when the software does not recognize a notice the user is attempting to dismiss
notice type language-notice-review: Preference label for dismissible notices shown on review pages
notice type language-notice-thing: Preference label for dismissible notices shown on review subject pages
close this window: Message that is shown in a new window when the user dismisses a dismissible notice without JavaScript
could not complete action: Generic error message that is shown when a client-side request to an API fails and a given action could not be completed as a result
site notification:
Generic text that is prepended to site-wide notifications
{{Identical|Notification}}
site error:
Generic error that is prepended to site-wide error messages
{{Identical|Error}}
notification language-changed: Please change the language name from 'English' to the language you're translating to. Site-wide notification that is shown when the user has changed their language to the language you're translating this message to
invalid language: Error message that is shown when user attempts to switch to a language that is not recognized
edit saved: Slightly whimsical success message that is shown when an edit has been saved
current language:
Label that is shown for the currently selected language in the language menu at the bottom. %s is substituted with name of the language.
{{Identical|Language}}
user:
Title for a user page. %s is substituded with the user's name
{{Identical|User}}
user not found: Title message that is shown when a given user page could not bef ound
user not found text: Content for message that is shown when a given user page could not be found
user bio:
Label for user's bio (short biographical details) that can be optionally added on the user page
{{Identical|Bio}}
add bio: Button for adding a user bio on the user page
edit bio: Button for editing a user bio on the user page
user registration date: Label for registration date that is shown on the user page
user teams: Label for user's team memberships taht is shown on the user page
no teams yet: Text that is shown when a given user is not a member of any teams yet
max characters: Text that is shown below the bio field on user page when editing bio, indicating maximum length of the field
remaining characters: Text that is shown indicating number of characters user still can add to bio in bio field on user page, %s is substituted with number
over maximum: Text that is shown indicating number of characters by which user has exceeded the allowable maximum in bio on user page, %s is substituted with number
supports markdown: Generic help text that is shown when a given field supports markdown formatting
data missing: Generic error message that is shown when a form submission was incomplete
team not found: Content for message that is shown when a given team could not be found
team not found title: Content for message that is shown when a given team could not be found
new team: Title for page for creating new teams
team name: Label for team name field in form for creating/editing teams
team motto: Label for team name motto field in form for creating/editing teams
team description: Label for team description field in form for creating/editing teams
team rules: Label for team rules field in form for creating/editing teams
team rules label: Label for team rules section on team page
team rules help label: Label for help text regarding team rules in form for creating/editing teams
mod approval to join: Label for checkbox in form for creating/editing teams
only mods can blog: Label for checkbox in form for creating/editing teams
team name help: Help text for team name field in form for creating/editing teams
team motto help: Help text for team motto field in form for creating/editing teams
team description help label: Label for help text for team description field in form for creating/editing teams
team description help: Help text for team description field in form for creating/editing teams
team rules help: Help text for team rules in form for creating/editing teams. Please preserve tabindex and target attribute of links to ensure keyboard accessibility / prevent loss of form contents.
maintenance mode: Title for message indicating that the site is down temporarily
in maintenance mode: Content for message indicating that the site is down temporarily
need team-name: Notice shown on form when user submits form without providing the given field
need team-motto: Notice shown on form when user submits form without providing the given field
need team-description: Notice shown on form when user submits form without providing the given field
need team-rules: Notice shown on form when user submits form without providing the given field
team title:
Title shown on team page. %s is substituted with the team's name
{{Identical|Team}}
team blog: Title for team blog. %s is substituted wit hthe team's name
latest blog posts: Headline for excerpt from team blog shown on team page
join this team: Headline for section of team page related to joining a team
request membership: Button for requesting membership in a team that requires approval
approval required to join: Notice informing user on team page that approval is required before they can join team
agree to the rules: Label for checkbox indicating that user agrees to the rules for joining a team
no blog posts: Notice indicating that a team blog does not have any content yet
write a blog post: Button for adding a post to a team blog
must be trusted: Additional explanation for permission error when untrusted user attempts to create a team
team deleted: Title for message showing that a team has been deleted
stale revision error title: Title for message shown when attempting to retrieve a stale revision
stale revision error: Content for messsage shown when attempting to retrieve a stale revision
team has been deleted: Content for message showing that a team has been deleted
browse teams: Title for page providing a list of all teams
new blog post: Button for writing a new team blog post. Can be translated as infinitive.
blog post title: Label for title field on blog form
blog post title help label:
Label for help text for title field on blog form
{{Identical|Title}}
blog post title help: Help text for title field on blog form.
blog post text:
Label for blog post text on blog form
{{Identical|Text}}
blog post text help: Help text for blog post text on blog form. Please preserve link target and tabindex to ensure form contents are not lost, and that the link remains keyboard accessible.
blog post page title: Title for blog post on blog form. %s is substituted with the title
enter blog post title: Placeholder for blog post title field on blog form
enter blog post: Placeholder for blog post text field on blog form
need post-title: Notice shown on form when user submits form without providing the given field.
need post-text: Notice shown on form when user submits form without providing the given field.
post not found title: Title for message shown when the given blog post could not be found
post not found: Content for message shown when the given blog post could not be found
edit blog post: Title for blog post form when editing a blog post
delete blog post: Title for page for deleting a blog post
blog post deleted: Title for message shown when a blog post has been deleted
blog post has been deleted: Content for message shown when a blog post has been deleted
database downloads: Title for page offering database downloads
older reviews: Link label for navigating to older reviews
teams intro: Introduction shown on page showing a list of all teams
create your own team untrusted: Instructions shown on page showing a list of all teams if the user does not have permission to create a team yet
start team preamble: Instructions shown at the top of the form for creating a new team
must agree to team rules: Error shown when user attempts to join team without agreeing to the team rules
moderator badge:
Indicator badge next to a username shown if the user is moderator of a given team
{{Identical|Moderator}}
founder badge:
Indicator badge next to a username shown if the user is founder of a given team
{{Identical|Founder}}
number of members: Label on team page for the number of members of a given team
view list: Link on team page for getting a list of all members of a given team
moderators:
Label on team page for the moderators of a given team
{{Identical|Moderator}}
membership roster: Title on page providing a list of all members of a given team. %s is substituted with team name
welcome to the team: Text for notification shown when user has joined a given team
leave team: Button for leaving a team. Can be translated as infinitive.
goodbye team: Text for notification shown when user has left a given team
application received: Text for notification shown on team page when a team membership request is pending
application rejected: Text for notification shown on team page when a team membership request has been rejected. %s is substituted with the date when the request was rejected.
application rejected with reason: Text for notification shown on team page when a team membership request has been rejected, and the moderator has provided a reason. %1$s is substituted with the date, %2$s with the reason text.
pending join request: Text for notification shown on the team page when there is a pending request to join the team. %s is substituted with a full link to the request.
pending join requests: Text for notification shown on the team page when there are multiple pending join requests. %2$s is substituted with the number, and %1$s is subsitituted with a link to the list of requests.
no pending join requests: Text shown on the page for managing membership requests if there are no pending requests
manage join requests: Title for the page for managing membership requests
join request message:
Label shown next to a user-authored message provided along with with a team membership request by the prospective member
{{Identical|Message}}
choose action: Label for the action that is to be taken on a given team membership request
defer request: Label for an action on a given team membership request
reject request: Label for an action on a given team membership request
accept request: Label for an action on a given team membership request
enter message: Label for a text field for an optional rejection message a moderator can provide when rejecting a team membership request
process requests: Button for processing team membership requests
request by: Label for the text that shows the name of a user who wants to join a team
request date:
Label for the date of a membership request
{{Identical|Date}}
no requests to process: Error message that is shown when the form to process membership requests was submitted but contained no actions
requests have been processed: Notification that is shown when at least one team membership request has been processed
user feed: Headline for list of reviews of a given user, %s is substituted with the user name
atom feed of all reviews: Description of the Atom feed of all reviews across the site, visible to feed readers that offer subscribers a choice between multiple feeds embedded in a page
review feed label:
Label for the review subject in an Atom feed
{{Identical|Review}}
atom feed of reviews by this user: Description of the Atom feed of all reviews by a given user, visible to feed readers that offer subscribers a choice between multiple feeds embedded in a page
atom feed of blog posts by team: Description of the Atom feed of all blog posts by a given team, visible to feed readers that offer subscribers a choice between multiple feeds embedded in a page
older blog posts: Link label for viewing older blog posts than the ones shown on the page
writing review of: Label for the subject of a review if the user is adding a review to a thing that already has been previously reviewed
sign in to review: Message shown on the page about a review subject (thing) if the user is not logged in
your review: Headline for the user's own review on the page about a review subject
reviews:
Headline for all reviews on the page about a review subject
{{Identical|Review}}
other reviews: Headline for reviews not written by the user on the page about a review subject, where the user has also written their own review
you already wrote a review: Message shown when the user attempts to create more than one review of a given review subject
add your review: Button for adding a review of a given review subject (thing)
editing review of: Label for the subject of a review when editing it
reviews of: Title for the Atom feed of all reviews of a given review subject. %s is substituted with the label or URL.
atom feed of all reviews of this item: Description of the Atom feed of all reviews of a given review subject (thing), visible to feed readers that offer subscribers a choice between multiple feeds embedded in a page
spoiler warning: Text for markdown blocks fenced in ::: spoiler - see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spoiler_(media) if you are unfamiliar with the term
nsfw warning: Text for markdown blocks fenced in ::: nsfw - see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Not_safe_for_work if you are unfamiliar with the term
add media: Button for selecting one or multiple files to upload regarding a review subject
related to: Sub-header shown on the file upload page to refer back to the review subject. %s is substituted with review subject label.
no file received: Error message shown if the upload form is submitted without any file
uploaded media: Heading for the subject of a review that lists files uploaded that relate to the subject
one file selected: Message shown on the file selector button for uploads if a single file is selected
files selected: Message shown on the file selector button for uploads if more than one file is selected
please complete your upload: Explanation shown after an upload that indicates the user has to take additional steps
filename:
Label for the filename field in step 2 of the upload process
{{Identical|Filename}}
upload description: Label for the upload description field in step 2 of the upload process
enter description: Placeholder for the upload description field in step 2 of the upload process
start upload: Button to begin an upload process
finish upload: Button to finalize an upload process once all data has been provided
my own work: Radiobutton selection for an upload that indicates that the file is the user's own work.
someone else's work: Radiobutton selection for an upload that indicates the file is someone else's work
enter creator name: Placeholder text for the creator of an uploaded file
creator: Label for the creator field of an uploaded file
creator help: Help text for the creator field of an uploaded file
source: Label for the source field of an uploaded file
enter source: Placeholder for the source field of an uploaded file
source help label:
Label for the source help text of an uploaded file
{{Identical|Source}}
source help: Help text for the source field of an uploaded file
license:
Label for the license field of an uploaded file
{{Identical|License}}
fair use: Radiobutton selection for an upload that satisfies  US law's fair use provisions according to the uploader
cc-0: Radiobutton selection for an uploaded file under CC-0 license or in the public domain
cc-by: Radiobutton selection for an uploaded file under CC-BY license
cc-by-sa: Radiobutton selection for an uploaded file under CC-BY-SA license
unsupported file type: Error message shown if user attempts to upload a file of a type that is not accepted by the site. %1$s is substituted with the filename, %2$s is substituted with the apparent file type
unrecognized file type: Error message shown if user attempts to upload a file whose file type cannot be detected. %s is substituted with the filename.
mime mismatch: Error message shown if user attempts to upload a file whose actual MIME type seems to be different than the form submission suggests (could be forged request, could be a file with the wrong extension). %1$s is substituted with the filenme, %2$s with the expected MIME type and %3$s with the actual MIME type.
not valid svg: Error message shown if user attempts to upload an SVG file that does not pass a shallow validation
upload needs description: Error message shown if user attempts to submit form without providing the given required field. %s is substituted with the filename.
upload needs creator: Error message shown if user attempts to submit form without providing the given required field. %s is substituted with the filename.
upload needs source: Error message shown if user attempts to submit form without providing the given required field. %s is substituted with the filename.
upload needs license: Error message shown if user attempts to submit form without providing the given required field. %s is substituted with the filename.
teams to associate: Heading for checkbox list of teams in the form for creating or editing reviews
not member of any teams yet: Notice we show in the form for creating or editing reviews if user is not member of any teams. Please preserve link target to avoid loss of form data.
submitted team could not be found: Error message shown if user attempts to submit a review with a team that could not be found
user is not member of submitted team: Error message shown if user attempts to submit a review with a team they are not a member of
posted under: Shown below a review, to indicate team associations and possibly other categorization in future.
team page: Shown next to a team's name on a review form, linking to its team page
latest review: Headline for the latest review shown on a team's page
team feed: Title for feed of reviews associated with a given team
atom feed of reviews by team: Embedded metadata description for Atom feed of all reviews by a given team
no reviews for team: Message shown on a team page if the team has not been associated with any reviews
no reviews for user: Message shown on a user page if the uesr has not authored any reviews
view all: Generic label for a link that leads to a list of all items with pagination, e.g., blog posts, reviews, etc.
faq acronym:
Short form of the 'Frequently Asked Questions' title. If no common acronym in your language, use English if familiar, otherwise spell out.
{{Identical|FAQ}}
faq:
Title of the 'Frequently Asked Questions' page (long form).
{{Identical|Frequently asked questions}}
help us grow: Text shown as a tooltip on every page if a user can generate invite links. If more than one, %s is substituted with the number.
invite users intro: Introduction text shown on the page where users can generate invite links used to register an account
you can generate links: Text shown on the invite page if the user can generate new invite links. If more than one, %s is substituted with the number.
generate link: Label for the button used to generate an invite link (can be translated as infinitive)
out of links: Error message shown if user attempts to generate links but has exceeded the number they have
link generated: Message shown immediately after a user creates an invite link
invite users: Title for the page where users can generate invite links
pending invitations: Headline for section showing invite links that have been generated but not used to register an account yet
accepted invitations: Headline for section showing invite links that have been used to register an account
invite link: Label used wherever we show actual invite links (noun)
created on: Label for date a given invite link was created
accepted by: Label for name of the user who used a given invite link to make an account
accepted on: Label for date a user used a given invite link to make an account
copy:
Label for buttons that copy text into the clipboard. Translate as infinitive.
{{Identical|Copy}}
invite link invalid title: Title for page shown if a given invite link is invalid (code not recognized)
invite link invalid: Text for page shown if a given invite link is invalid
invite link already used title: Title for page shown if a given invite link has already been used to register an account
invite link already used: Text for page shown if a given invite link has already been used
language temporarily changed: Message shown if the language of a page is temporarily changed using the ?uselang parameter. Change the word 'English' to the name of the language you are translating this message to. %1$s will be substituted with the name of the language the user would see if ?uselang was not set.
change language permanently: Label for button that will make a ?uselang selection permanent. Change the word 'English' to the name of the language you are translating this message to.
reload this page: Label for link to undo a ?uselang language selection for a given page. %s will be substituted with the name of the user's currently configured language.
explore teams: Headline shown on the main page to highlight some randomly selected teams.
team intro: Explanation that is shown on the frontpage.
duplicate team name: Warning that is shown after saving a team if there is a name collision.
thing label help: Help text that is shown next to the input for review subject (thing) labels.
search lib.reviews: Text that is shown as a placeholder inside the search box, and as a headline on the standalone search page.
search results:
Headline that is shown on the search results page.
{{Identical|Search results}}
no results: Message that is shown when no search results could be found.
matches in review subjects: Headline that is shown on the search result page for text matches in review subjects (thing labels).
matches in review text: Headline that is shown on the search result page for text matches in review text.
one or multiple matches: Text that is shown on the search result page to highlight how many reviews of a given thing matched the entered search text.
search help: Help text that is shown on the search page. Feel free to localize the examples, however, you're encouraged to keep "quotation marks (marks "", not words)" as is, i.e. other quotation marks' styles such as '', „”, “”, 「」, 『』, ‘’, and «» are not handled correctly.
show more:
Label for a control that expands a section of text shortened to reduce clutter.
{{Identical|Show more}}
show less: Label for a control that collapses a previously expanded section of text.
development diary: Headline used on the frontpage for the section which shows selected posts from the development diary.
markdown format: (Rendered in all-caps.) Label for button that lets the user switch from rich text editing to markdown editing
rich text format: (Rendered in all-caps.) Label for button that lets the user switch from markdown editing to rich text (visual) editing. Feel free to pick the translation that best corresponds to the meaning, or a term like WYSIWYG if it is more commonly used.
insert image:
Label for pull down menu item in the rich text editor
{{Identical|Image}}
insert image help: Tooltip for the pull down menu item to insert an image
insert image dialog title: Title for the dialog that lets the user insert an image by URL
insert:
Label for the pull down menu that lets the user insert images and other content
{{Identical|Insert}}
insert help: Tooltip for the pull down menu that lets the user insert images and other content
insert horizontal rule: Label for the pull down menu item to insert a horizontal rule
insert horizontal rule help: Tooltip for the pull down menu item to insert a horizontal rule
image url: Field name for the dialog to insert an image by URL in the rich text editor
image alt text: Field name for the dialog to insert an image by URL in the rich text editor. Used for the ALT text read by screen readers and other accessibility tools.
add or remove link: Tooltip for the menu button that lets the user add or remove a link in the rich text editor
add link dialog title: Title for the dialog that lets the user add a link in the rich text editor (removal is done without a dialog).
web address: Field name in the dialog for inserting a link in the rich text editor
toggle bold: Tooltip for the button that lets the user toggle bold formatting in the rich text editor
toggle italic: Tooltip for the button that lets the user toggle italic formatting in the rich text editor
toggle code: Tooltip for the button that lets the user toggle inline code formatting in the rich text editor
format block:
Label for the pull down menu that lets the user format a whole block or paragraph in the rich text editor. Can be translated as noun or verb, whichever is shorter.
{{Identical|Format}}
format block help: Tooltip for the pull down menu that lets the user format a whole block or paragraph in the rich text editor
format as bullet list: Tooltip for the button that formats the current paragraph as a bullet point list item in the rich text editor
format as numbered list: Tooltip for the button that formats the current paragraph as a numbered list item in the rich text editor
format as quote: Tooltip for the button that formats the current paragraph as a quotation in the rich text editor
format as paragraph help: Tooltip for the pull down menu item that lets the user format the current block as a plain text paragraph in the rich text editor
format as paragraph:
Label for the menu item that lets the user format the current block as a plain text paragraph in the rich text editor
{{Identical|Paragraph}}
format as code block:
Label for the pull down menu item that lets the user format the current block as code in the rich text editor
{{Identical|Code}}
format as code block help: Tooltip for the menu item that lets the user format the current block as code in the rich text editor
format as heading:
Label for the pull down menu item that lets the user format the current block as a headline in the rich text editor
{{Identical|Heading}}
format as level heading help: Tooltip for sub-menu item that lets the user format the current block as a heading of the level substituted into %d (1-6)
format as level heading:
Label for sub-menu item that lets the user format the current block as a heading of the level substituted into %d (1-6)
{{Identical|Level}}
format as spoiler:
Label for the pull down menu item that lets the user format the current block as a spoiler that is collapsed by default.
{{Identical|Spoiler}}
format as spoiler help: Tooltip for the menu item that lets the user format the current block as a spoiler
format as nsfw: Label for the pull down menu item that lets the user format the current block as 'not-safe-for-work' (adult or otherwise explicit) and collapsed by default.
format as nsfw help: Tooltip for the menu item that lets the user format the current block as 'not-safe-for-work'
format as custom warning: Label for the pull down menu item that lets the format text so is collapsed by default, with a custom warning text rendered on top of it.
format as custom warning help: Tooltip for the menu item that lets the user format text as collapsed by default with a custom warning
format as custom warning dialog title: Headline for dialog in rich-text-editor where user can enter custom warning text that is shown for collapsed content
custom warning text: Placeholder for input field where user can enter custom warning text that is shown for collapsed content
undo: Tooltip for the button that lets the user undo a change in the rich-text editor
redo: Tooltip for the button that lets the user redo a change in the rich-text editor
join with item above: Tooltip for the button that combines items,  e.g. two bullet point items into one, in the rich text editor
decrease item indentation: Tooltip for the button that decreases the indentation level of items in the rich text editor
required field: Label for the balloon message shown in dialogs in the rich-text editor that have required fields (e.g., image URL for images)
ok:
Label for the button to confirm a dialog in the rich-text editor
{{Identical|OK}}
remember rte preference: Tooltip for the pin that is shown next to the rich-text editor mode switcher to let the user make the preference 'sticky'.
forget rte preference: Tooltip for the pin that is shown next to the rich-text editor mode switcher to go back to the default markdown editor.
full screen mode: Tooltip for the button that switches into full screen mode in the rich-text editor.
not a member of team title: Title for the page that is shown when the user attempts to access the form to create a new review for a given team, but is not a member of said team.
not a member of team: Body for the page that is shown when the user attempts to access the form to create a new review for a given team, but is not a member of said team.
